Proposals for raising a thousand pounds Povey, Charles, 1652?-1743.
4 p.
printed by Henry Hills in Black-Fryers, near the Water-side, [London : [1699]]
Attribution from first line of text. Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; date of publication from DNB. Identified as Wing (2nd ed.) P3740 on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700", reel 2124.2. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
